Name: Application Code
Remark: immutable unique value generated on Application creation, format of "AID<nnn>", or "CID<nnnn>" for components

Name: Max Criticality
Remark: Computed Risk Attribute (maximum risk out of all 4 risk attributes)

Name: Number of Message Flows
Remark: Computed value based on number of entered interfaces

Name: Internal ID
Remark: Exported as unchangeable object ID to CMS
